author: lzybkr
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

PowerShell runs on Mac, so it's not just LINUX, so I've changed the preprocessor macro to reflect this.
title: Change preprocessor macro LINUX to UNIX
